quote: He slowed down a bit more. ""Gaia, how do you know these things?"" She shrugged. ""I'm smart."" ""And modest, too."" ""Modesty is a waste of time,"" she pronounced. ""I'll keep that in mind.
quote_letters: HE SLOWED DOWN A BIT MORE GAIA HOW DO YOU KNOW THESE THINGS SHE SHRUGGED IM SMART AND MODEST TOO MODESTY IS A WASTE OF TIME SHE PRONOUNCED ILL KEEP THAT IN MIND
